commit.message:
Merge pull request #587 from thegoodboy1234/master

#90 #57 Lab4 -设置布局和界面，及窗体切换逻辑

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:background="#40ffd2"
+    tools:context="com.hzu.lxh.mencard.Game">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="游戏窗口"
+        android:id="@+id/t_game"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:textSize="60dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="119dp" />
+</RelativeLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,99 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:background="#ffb340"
+    tools:context="com.hzu.lxh.mencard.Setting">
+
+    <Button
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="确定"
+        android:id="@+id/ok_btn"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="27dp"
+        android:layout_marginStart="27dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="36dp"
+        android:textSize="40dp"/>
+
+    <Button
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="取消"
+        android:id="@+id/cncel_btn"
+        android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/ok_btn"
+        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
+        android:layout_marginRight="40dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="20dp"
+        android:textSize="40dp"/>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge"
+        android:text="音频设置"
+        android:id="@+id/vol_set"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
+        android:textSize="40dp"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
+    <ProgressBar
+        android:id="@+id/prebox"
+        android:layout_width="200dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal"
+        android:max="100"
+        android:progress="50"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/vol_set"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
+        android:layout_marginTop="92dp"
+        android:layout_alignRight="@+id/vol_set"
+        android:layout_alignEnd="@+id/vol_set"
+        android:indeterminate="false" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge"
+        android:text="最小"
+        android:id="@+id/t_min"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/prebox"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
+        android:layout_marginTop="29dp" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge"
+        android:text="最大"
+        android:id="@+id/textView"
+        android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/t_min"
+        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="音量大小"
+        android:textSize="30dp"
+        android:id="@+id/textView2"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
+        android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/prebox"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
+
+
+</RelativeLayout>
